description: This file defines a FastAPI router for assessments, including endpoints for listing, creating, and deleting assessments. It demonstrates role-based access control (RBAC) enforcement using dependency injection and security policies, with endpoints being minimal and database-free.

methods.name: list_assessments
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list assessments, requiring roles in READ_ROLES.

methods.name: create_assessment
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create an assessment, requiring roles in WRITE_ROLES.

methods.name: delete_assessment
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to delete an assessment, requiring roles in ADMIN_ROLES.
